title: Is Elise underpowered?
body: I've tried to play Elise a few times. All of them turned out horrible. She is squishy and doesn't do enough damage IMO. Sure she does % damage, but that is based on CURRENT health. Yes, you can R then E and Q them, but her damage is that bad that they can kill you straight after jumping... It's umm... I dunno. I'm probably just really bad with her :P

replies.body:
Elise is a really tough champion to play right now. She's relatively unforgiving with her mistakes and she has a huge amount of mechanics that take a lot of games to get the hang of. From my perspective right now Elise can still do a huge amount of burst damage, but she has to build squishy to do so.

I'm not sure she's necessarily 'weak' right now, from my perspective at Challenger/Diamond games there are still a few Elise mains who have found a lot of success on her, but I do think she's 'hard to play'. If you're interested in committing to Elise I'd say go for it, she's one of the more rewarding champions to invest your time into.

She blows now, imo, if only because she is horrendously lacking in fun to play now.  Everything is so dependant on landing a stun; you're squishy as %%%%... she's just, ugh.

On top of that she's overshadowed by every other jungle in terms of ease of play relative to effectiveness.  Don't bother with her.

Elise is not underpowered tbh most people just underestimate how good she is, she is a tank or an APC not both, if you're getting 1 shot liandries and then full tank would be fine, if you want to play assassain go full AP with an abyssal or void to ignore their magic resist and just execute them with venomous bite.

People should stop complaining about her, she is a difficult champ to play 100% agree, but she is not underpowered she is fine but doesn't really fit the Meta atm, maybe if riot buff her a bit so her Q does more at earlier ranks she may re-enter the Meta as an APC/TANK/AP or TANKY JG

She's kind of meant to be build as an AP bruiser, (not sure tho I never play or see her) with items like Liandry's and Ryali's, then tanky items like Randuinn's Omen. IMO, she has percent HP damage, so she doesn't really need to be built as AP. :)

no she's not. is you go full AP she can 1-shot people. If you build her tanky shes still ok, kinda like a rammus. Provides CC and a tank but has a better smite+execute.

I personally build her slighty tanky. Magus - Sunfire - Sorcs - Void Staff - situational (usually Abyssal) - situational. Provides very good execute damage but doesn't get 1-shot like Full AP Elise.

Her human Q is based on Current Health her Spider Q is based on missing health. She used to be crazy strong, now shes just solid.

Her full combo is (starting in human form human) Q-W-E-R-Q-W.
She's pretty decent in the Top Lane atm. Just Rush Liandry's and Sorc's then get Frozen Heart, Abyssal, SV and Thornmail/Zhonya's.
if you build her ap build flat magic pen otherwise go full tank, shes a utility/sustain champ
